fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Fireball** - Shoot a fireball at someone, attacking them.
**Whail**- Spook somebody, roleblocking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Your visits are Astral.
-If you use Fireball on someone with Powerful or higher attack, you die and give a ghast tear to the head.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Slay all else and turn them into gear.
